channel.title: Anti-syi/blitzbot (edit)
channel.description:
[center][font=arial black][b][size=24pt]ANTI-SYI/BLITZBOT[/size][/b][/font][/center] [center][size=10pt]I have just made a new script that blocks [u][i][b]ALL[/b][/i][/u] spammers. This is of course down to your source, Im using GnarlyScapePK CREDITS: Me - 80% 10% - Source Creator 10% Coder of the Blocking Script THIS IS THE ORIGINAL POST - OTHERS WHO WRITE THIS HAVEN'T MADE THIS[/size][/center]
[hr] [center][size=12pt][i][u][b]Please try not to criticise it, Just try it![/b][/u][/i][/size][/center] [hr]
BEFORE YOU START [b]FIND[/b] :
[code=java] initialize() [/code]
([b]NOTE[/b]: THIS PART IS ALL DOWN TO YOUR SAVE METHOD, WHICH YOU WILL NEED TO CHECK) Below that [b]add[/b] this:-
[code=java] savechar(); [/code] WHAT THIS DOES IS MAKE THE PLAYER SAVE AS SOON AS THEY LOGIN WITHOUT LOGGING OUT
[i]As you know the AllGoFree Blitzbot uses numbers in its username. So I thought to myself "How can I block this?" I used this script that I found: [/i]
[code=java] if(playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("Shit") || playerName.contains("Dam") || playerName.contains("Ass") || playerName.contains("Cock") || playerName.contains("Dick") || playerName.contains("Pussy") || playerName.contains("Nig") || playerName.contains("Homo") || playerName.contains("Fag") || playerName.contains("Suck") || playerName.contains("Wanker") || playerName.contains("Sex") || playerName.contains("Bi") || playerName.contains("Gay") || playerName.contains("Bitch") || playerName.contains("Suk") || playerName.contains("Suc") || playerName.contains("Sukc") || playerName.contains("Fuk") || playerName.contains("Fck") || playerName.contains("Fuck") || playerName.contains("Fu") || playerName.contains("Whore") || playerName.contains("Hoe") || playerName.contains("zapto") || playerName.contains("penis") || playerName.contains("noip") || playerName.contains("cunt") || playerName.contains("kunt") || playerName.contains("hooker") || playerName.contains("baster") || playerName.contains("anal") || playerName.contains("Gey") || playerName.contains("Qweef") || playerName.contains("fux0r") || playerName.contains("Porn") || playerName.contains("P0rn") || playerName.contains("D4m") || playerName.contains("wtf") || playerName.contains("C0ck") || playerName.contains("nutsack") || playerName.contains("masturbat") || playerName.contains("feg") || playerName.contains("kawk") || playerName.contains("piss") || playerName.contains("vagina") || playerName.contains("cum") || playerName.contains("ball") || playerName.contains("h4xor") || playerName.contains("poop") || playerName.contains("h0r") || playerName.contains("butt") || playerName.contains("pimp") || playerName.contains("screw") || playerName.contains("schmuck") || playerName.contains("foreskin") || playerName.contains("nazi") || playerName.contains("kuk") || playerName.contains("dike") [/code]
I SUGGEST YOU [b]ADD[/b] THIS ALSO:-
[code=java]if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("_") || playerName.contains("`") || playerName.contains("'")) { disconnected = true;[/code]
NOW WE [b]ADD[/b] THE LIST OF NUMBERS LIKE SO:-
[code=java] || playerName.contains("1") || playerName.contains("2") || playerName.contains("3") || playerName.contains("4") || playerName.contains("5") || playerName.contains("6") || playerName.contains("7") || playerName.contains("8") || playerName.contains("9") || playerName.contains("10") || playerName.contains("0")) { [/code] [b]WHAT THIS DOES IS BLOCKS ALL NUMBERS IN THE USERNAME.[/b] [u][b]DON'T[/b][/u] ADD THIS IF YOU WANT PLAYERS TO HAVE NUMBERS!
([b]NOTE:[/b]THIS ALSO DEPENDS ON YOUR SOURCE AND METHODS) NOW BELOW THIS [b]ADD[/b]:-
[code=java] appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom); [/code]
[center]WHAT THIS WILL DO IS IPBAN THEM AND BECAUSE THEY ARE SAVED WHEN THEY LOGIN THEY GET BANNED INSTANTLY ONE THING ABOUT THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE SPEED THEY WILL CONNECT YOU WILL HAVE ABOUT 3 GET THROUGH TILL THIS BLOCKS IT.
[b]IF YOU TEST IT, THIS WILL HAPPEN:[/b] [img]http://i240.photobucket.com/albums/ff106/mrxphonedownloads/proof.jpg[/img] [hr] THIS WORKS! THE SYIPKPKER/ALLGOFREE BOT USES NUMBERS IN ITS USERNAME. STOP THE NUMBERS IN THE USERNAME, YOU STOP THEM. SIMPLE! [hr]
THANKS[/center] [center]scapexscape[/center]

item.title: Anti-syi/blitzbot (edit)
item.dc:creator: @scapexscape scapexscape
item.description:
@scapexscape wrote:

[center][font=arial black][size=24pt]ANTI-SYI/BLITZBOT[/size][/font][/center]
[center][size=10pt]I have just made a new script that blocks ALL spammers.
This is of course down to your source, Im using GnarlyScapePK
CREDITS: Me - 80% 10% - Source Creator 10% Coder of the Blocking Script
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL POST - OTHERS WHO WRITE THIS HAVEN’T MADE THIS[/size][/center]

[hr]
[center][size=12pt]Please try not to criticise it, Just try it![/size][/center]
[hr]

BEFORE YOU START FIND :

 initialize()

(NOTE: THIS PART IS ALL DOWN TO YOUR SAVE METHOD, WHICH YOU WILL NEED TO CHECK) Below that add this:-

 savechar();

WHAT THIS DOES IS MAKE THE PLAYER SAVE AS SOON AS THEY LOGIN WITHOUT LOGGING OUT

As you know the AllGoFree Blitzbot uses numbers in its username.
So I thought to myself “How can I block this?”
I used this script that I found: 

if(playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("Shit") || playerName.contains("Dam") || playerName.contains("Ass") || playerName.contains("Cock") || playerName.contains("Dick") || playerName.contains("Pussy") || playerName.contains("Nig") || 
                        playerName.contains("Homo") || playerName.contains("Fag") || playerName.contains("Suck") || playerName.contains("Wanker") || playerName.contains("Sex") || playerName.contains("Bi") || playerName.contains("Gay") || playerName.contains("Bitch") || playerName.contains("Suk") || playerName.contains("Suc") || playerName.contains("Sukc") || playerName.contains("Fuk") || 
                        playerName.contains("Fck") || playerName.contains("Fuck") || playerName.contains("Fu") || playerName.contains("Whore") || playerName.contains("Hoe") || playerName.contains("zapto") || playerName.contains("penis") || playerName.contains("noip") || playerName.contains("cunt") || playerName.contains("kunt") || playerName.contains("hooker") || playerName.contains("baster") || 
                        playerName.contains("anal") || playerName.contains("Gey") || playerName.contains("Qweef") || playerName.contains("fux0r") || playerName.contains("Porn") || playerName.contains("P0rn") || playerName.contains("D4m") || playerName.contains("wtf") || playerName.contains("C0ck") || playerName.contains("nutsack") || playerName.contains("masturbat") || playerName.contains("feg") || playerName.contains("kawk") || 
                        playerName.contains("piss") || playerName.contains("vagina") || playerName.contains("cum") || playerName.contains("ball") || playerName.contains("h4xor") || playerName.contains("poop") || playerName.contains("h0r") || playerName.contains("butt") || playerName.contains("pimp") || playerName.contains("screw") || playerName.contains("schmuck") || playerName.contains("foreskin") || 
                        playerName.contains("nazi") || playerName.contains("kuk") || playerName.contains("dike")

I SUGGEST YOU ADD THIS ALSO:-

if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("_") || playerName.contains("`") || playerName.contains("'")) { disconnected = true;

NOW WE ADD THE LIST OF NUMBERS LIKE SO:-

|| playerName.contains("1") || playerName.contains("2") || playerName.contains("3") || playerName.contains("4") || playerName.contains("5") || playerName.contains("6") || playerName.contains("7") || playerName.contains("8") || playerName.contains("9") || playerName.contains("10") || playerName.contains("0")) {

WHAT THIS DOES IS BLOCKS ALL NUMBERS IN THE USERNAME.
DON’T ADD THIS IF YOU WANT PLAYERS TO HAVE NUMBERS!

(NOTE:THIS ALSO DEPENDS ON YOUR SOURCE AND METHODS) NOW BELOW THIS ADD:-

 appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom);

[center]WHAT THIS WILL DO IS IPBAN THEM AND BECAUSE THEY ARE SAVED WHEN THEY LOGIN THEY GET BANNED INSTANTLY
ONE THING ABOUT THIS IS BECAUSE OF THE SPEED THEY WILL CONNECT YOU WILL HAVE ABOUT 3 GET THROUGH TILL THIS BLOCKS IT.

IF YOU TEST IT, THIS WILL HAPPEN:

[hr]
THIS WORKS! THE SYIPKPKER/ALLGOFREE BOT USES NUMBERS IN ITS USERNAME. STOP THE NUMBERS IN THE USERNAME, YOU STOP THEM. SIMPLE!
[hr]

THANKS[/center]
[center]scapexscape[/center]
